fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / rain shivers
fields.Condition: Variable["auto.is_raining"]  and  Variable["auto.is_snowing"] == false  and  Variable["plaza.rain_viscal_done"] == false  and  Variable["whirling.kimintro_hub_reached"]  and  Variable["auto.on_whirling_balcony"] == false
fields.Placement: the whole martinaise plaza in front of whirling: the stairs to the see, the bookstore, the crater, the way to the kiosque. everything except the yard and the jam

fields.Title: Shivers: "Sheets of rain over the water. A fl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sheets of rain over the water. A flight of stairs leading into the ocean. Wave after wave washing the coast of Martinaise, with its motorboats and gently swaying reeds.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The rain falls."
fields.Dialogue Text: The rain falls.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A yard. Rain falls onto the roof of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A yard. Rain falls onto the roof of a woodshed. The lingering odour of decomposition mixes with that of damp soil.

fields.Title: Mack Torson: ""Wonder if Vic's found his long los..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wonder if Vic's found his long lost boyfriend yet." He looks over at Chester McLaine and breaks into a laugh at his own joke. The rain falls outside.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Shivers: "Behind the gates -- heaps of supply..."]
Esprit de Corps: "On the bridge, Officers Torson and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the bridge, Officers Torson and McLaine are standing guard. Torson wears jeans and a fishnet wifebeater. Satellite-Officer Vicquemare passes by, and the young man remarks to him...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Midnight news and reruns."
fields.Dialogue Text: Midnight news and reruns.

fields.Title: You: "What am I doing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What am I doing?

fields.Title: Shivers: "Looking up at the sky, cold water d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looking up at the sky, cold water dripping from your hair.
fields.Alternate1: Looking up at the sky, cold water dripping from your hat.

fields.Title: You: "What is beyond the Couron?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is beyond the Couron?

fields.Title: You: "Will I?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Will I?

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "It's the only home you have now. Bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's the only home you have now. But you can't go back. Not like this.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A traffic jam. Rain thrumming on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A traffic jam. Rain thrumming on the roofs of motor vehicles. Inside, drivers watch water streaming down their windshields. The statue of a king shudders, he too is cold. The canal bridge has been raised.

fields.Title: You: "Who are you, ghosts?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who are you, ghosts?

fields.Title: Shivers: "No. You are just one of the hundred..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. You are just one of the hundreds of thousands who watch them rise across the bay from Martinaise every day.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Two green snakeskin shoes stand at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two green snakeskin shoes stand at attention on the mosaic paving of the plaza.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Standing in the rain, looking north..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Standing in the rain, looking north, where Jamrock Rock City stretches inland.

fields.Title: Chester McLaine: ""That would be *irresponsible*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That would be *irresponsible*."

fields.Title: Nix Gottlieb: "The Precinct surgeon, chewing on a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Precinct surgeon, chewing on a piece of candy, throws her a questioning glance, walking by: "Need a hand with that?"

fields.Title: You: "How does it feel?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How does it feel?

fields.Title: Shivers: "The great gates of the industrial h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The great gates of the industrial harbour are locked. A chill runs down your back. You shudder like an animal trying to shake water from its hide.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You have never been there. They don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have never been there. They don't need the law east of the river.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A yard. Rain falls onto the roof of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A yard. Rain falls onto the roof of a woodshed. Coal leaks into a puddle beneath a dead man's feet. He swings from a tree, bloated. Droplets of rain slip from his cold cheeks.
fields.Alternate1: A yard. Rain falls onto the roof of a woodshed. Coal leaks into a puddle beneath the feet of a dead man. He swings from a tree, a gaping hole in his bare, rotting chest.

fields.Title: Chester McLaine: ""Mack, they're *hetero-sexual life..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mack, they're *hetero-sexual life partners*. It's not like that," his partner smirks. "But yeah. There's trouble in paradise for that duo, Tequila Sunset has..." The sound of the rain grows so loud it drowns out his voice.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Your hair sticks to your forehead,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your hair sticks to your forehead, cold and wet.

fields.Title: You: "And closer to here?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And closer to here?

fields.Title: You: ""It's cool. I'm in control.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's cool. I'm in control."

fields.Title: You: "Look up."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look up.

fields.Title: Shivers: "To be in Martinaise, where no one g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To be in Martinaise, where no one goes. At the run-off point of a long-forgotten canal, in the whitest part of town. In the shadow of the day the Revolution failed.

fields.Title: Shivers: "In the rain-swept distance above th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the rain-swept distance above the rooftops of Jamrock, a re-purposed silk mill stands perched above the motorway exit. Precinct 41 hunches in the rain.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No, nothing. It's just... Judit we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, nothing. It's just... Judit went to his place and found the Monday mail unopened. I think he's still *there*. You didn't, like, drink with him over the weekend did you?"

fields.Title: Mack Torson: ""With that animal? Never again, man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "With that animal? Never again, man. What, is he still down there, in... you know, south of the interchange? The... what was it?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Your shirt sticks to your chest. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your shirt sticks to your chest. The shoulders of your disco blazer grow heavy. The cold finds its way in under your skin. You shiver, and the city shivers with you.

fields.Title: You: "What's in the south?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's in the south?

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Hallways collapsed from the mortar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hallways collapsed from the mortar hits of a war that was lost long ago. Clotheslines go to waste in the rain. Radios play.

fields.Title: Shivers: "More coalition aerostatics. Way up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More coalition aerostatics. Way up there -- where rain forms -- rotors flutter silently. Your sight clears.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Patrol Officer Judit Minot stands b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Patrol Officer Judit Minot stands beneath the awning overhanging the entrance, struggling to open her big black umbrella.

fields.Title: Shivers: "You shudder, looking down at your f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You shudder, looking down at your feet. Dirty rainwater runs veins into the plaza snow.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A silvery curtain of rain over the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A silvery curtain of rain over the houses. The class divide.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Urban coastline, rain dripping off..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Urban coastline, rain dripping off eternite-covered roofs. Cinder blocks left over from half-finished construction. A defunct research and development building once seized by revolutionaries. An old wooden church stands on stilts above the water.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The skyscrapers of La Delta, the fi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The skyscrapers of La Delta, the financial district. Faint golden light seeps from the office windows.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "From the corner of his eye, the lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From the corner of his eye, the lieutenant gives your feet a worried glance. Rain drips from his glasses.

fields.Title: You: "What am I doing here?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What am I doing here?

fields.Title: You: "Shudder, look further..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shudder, look further...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The evening news."
fields.Dialogue Text: The evening news.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Shivers: "Your vision blurs. You wipe your fa..."]
Shivers: "Humid. Your coat shields you from t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Humid. Your coat shields you from the rain while the city shivers around you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods, then looks eas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods, then looks east.

fields.Title: You: "Where do I live?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where do I live?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The morning news."
fields.Dialogue Text: The morning news.

fields.Title: You: "What is in the west?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is in the west?

fields.Title: You: "Clench your teeth to stop shudderin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Clench your teeth to stop shuddering.

fields.Title: You: "And beyond that?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And beyond that?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods, then looks eas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods, then looks east.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Coalition aerostatics hang like app..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Coalition aerostatics hang like apparitions under the cloud cover. Way up there -- where rain forms -- rotors flutter silently. Your sight clears.

fields.Title: CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")
CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")

fields.Title: !(CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat"))

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")) == false

fields.Title: Judit Minot: ""No. Thank you. I got it." She gets..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. Thank you. I got it." She gets the umbrella to open, and, with a quick smile and nod to the surgeon, sprints down the steps. The rain falls all around her...

fields.Title: You: "And before that?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And before that?

fields.Title: Shivers: "Capeside apartments -- tower blocks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Capeside apartments -- tower blocks crowd one another, 4.46 mm bullets still lodged in their war-torn stone walls.

fields.Title: Shivers: "You realize you have no shoes on. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You realize you have no shoes on. Your feet are red with cold.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckEquipped("shoes_snakeskin") == false  and  CheckEquipped("shoes_snakeskin_left") == false  and  CheckEquipped("shoes_snakeskin_right") == false

fields.Title: You: "What is there?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is there?

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Huh? Yeah." He opens his umbrella,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh? Yeah." He opens his umbrella, but the wind immediately turns it inside out.

fields.Title: Mack Torson: ""Hetero -- sexual. Life -- partners.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hetero -- sexual. Life -- partners."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Your shirt sticks to your chest. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your shirt sticks to your chest. The shoulders of your jacket grow heavy. The cold finds its way under your skin. You shiver, and the city shivers with you.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A yard. Rain falls onto the roof of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A yard. Rain falls onto the roof of a woodshed. Filthy water pools around a body. Droplets of rain slip from the dead man's cold cheeks.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Shivers: "Your vision blurs. You wipe your fa..."]
You: "What's below?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's below?

fields.Title: You: "Run your fingers through your dampe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Run your fingers through your dampened hair.

fields.Title: You: "Let go of the feeling."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let go of the feeling.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Satellite-Officer Jean Vicquemare r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Satellite-Officer Jean Vicquemare rushes down the Precinct stairs, umbrella in hand. It's unopened. He doesn't seem pleased about the spring rain.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Your shirt sticks to your chest. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your shirt sticks to your chest. The cold finds its way under your skin. You shiver, and the city shivers with you.

fields.Title: You: "What's in the north?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's in the north?

fields.Title: Composure: "There's a Frittte on the corner. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a Frittte on the corner. A plastic coat is folded into a small triangle under the counter by the window. Beyond that, the strikebreakers have gathered.

fields.Title: Shivers: "These spring thaw will not last. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These spring thaw will not last. The winter will return to Revachol.

fields.Title: You: "What is down the shore?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is down the shore?

fields.Title: Shivers: "YOU CANNOT RETURN."
fields.Dialogue Text: YOU CANNOT RETURN.

fields.Title: You: "Where the hood, where the hood, whe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where the hood, where the hood, where the hood at?

fields.Title: Shivers: "HAVE A BROTHER IN THE CUT. WHERE TH..."
fields.Dialogue Text: HAVE A BROTHER IN THE CUT. WHERE THE WOOD AT?

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""In Martinaise. He's in Martinaise.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "In Martinaise. He's in Martinaise."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Winter's grip on the city is loosen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Winter's grip on the city is loosening. The spring thaw is here.

fields.Title: You: "Finally. What now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Finally. What now?

fields.Title: Shivers: "Grey sky like great battleships, cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Grey sky like great battleships, clouds colliding with one another. Rain falls down on the world.

fields.Title: You: "Shake your shoulders again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake your shoulders again.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Collapsed storm drains. Old sewage..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Collapsed storm drains. Old sewage systems flooded with rainwater. Hidden weapon caches from the Revolution. Doors leading down to Le Royaume -- the catacombs to which, for three centuries, they delivered the blue-blooded dead.

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Funny apery." Vicquemare struggles..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny apery." Vicquemare struggles with his umbrella, the ribs are protruding from its canopy. "Male-centric workplace humour. Have you seen him?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This rain will not let up any time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This rain will not let up any time soon. You should get a raincoat. There's a Frittte to the east. They sell them there."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This rain will not let up any time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This rain will not let up any time soon. At least we're dressed for it -- let's keep moving."

fields.Title: Shivers: "The shoulders of your jacket grow h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The shoulders of your jacket grow heavy. The cold finds its way under your skin. You shiver, and the city shivers with you.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Water runs down your bare chest. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Water runs down your bare chest. The cold finds its way under your skin. You shiver, and the city shivers with you.

fields.Title: You: "What do I see?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What do I see?

fields.Title: Composure: "You're not dressed for this weather..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're not dressed for this weather. You should get an overcoat, or a patrol cloak.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Will you ever go there?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Will you ever go there?

fields.Title: Shivers: "Revachol is the capital of the worl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Revachol is the capital of the world. Jamrock is the capital of Revachol. Droplets form on your eyelashes.

fields.Title: You: ""I should probably do something abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I should probably do something about this."

fields.Title: You: "Shake the shivers off. [Discard tho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake the shivers off. [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Shivers: "Behind the gates -- heaps of supply..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Behind the gates -- heaps of supply crates. Red and blue metal shipping containers slick with rain. The Greater Revachol Industrial Harbour is an artificial mountain range. Immense wealth resides within, and immeasurable poverty in its shadow.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Coal City, end of all lines."
fields.Dialogue Text: Coal City, end of all lines.

fields.Title: You: "Why am I not there?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why am I not there?

fields.Title: Shivers: "On a street there that flows like a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On a street there that flows like a muddy river in the snow, with fire traps rising on either side. A film rental opens its doors to the rain, an armoured motor carriage rushes past the corner where you used to walk together... Suddenly, the hair on your back rises.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The ruins of a half-sunken seafort..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The ruins of a half-sunken seafort crumble on an inlet. Beyond the Bay of Revachol, ghosts rise into the sky.

fields.Title: You: "What's above?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's above?

fields.Title: You: ""Motherfucker." [Finish thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Motherfucker." [Finish thought.]

fields.Title: Shivers: "Your hair is an oily mess flecked w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your hair is an oily mess flecked with ash from neighbouring coal plants. Smoke stacks rise somewhere in the distance.

fields.Title: Mack Torson: ""Where's your homo, homey?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where's your homo, homey?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This rain will not let up any time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This rain will not let up any time soon. I'd recommend you put on your coat."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The news at noon."
fields.Dialogue Text: The news at noon.

fields.Title: Shivers: "All around you, rain falls on the g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All around you, rain falls on the great city of Revachol. Rain drips from the eaves and floods the gutters, washing the filth away.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Couron, the lower middle class. Dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Couron, the lower middle class. Distributary after distributary cuts the city blocks in half. Seven-story buildings trail off into the rain.

fields.Title: You: "What's on the other side?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's on the other side?

fields.Title: Shivers: "The road ascends; a raised motorway..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The road ascends; a raised motorway loops above the ghetto. Beneath its concrete columns -- a sea of rooftops, woodwork, and tar stretches northward. Four-story buildings as far as the rain can fall. The snows melt in Jamrock.

fields.Title: Chester McLaine: ""It's not like that. They're what y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not like that. They're what you call *hetero-sexual life partners*. They have a battle-tested relationship. A 'bröderbund', if you will."

fields.Title: Mack Torson: ""Is there something wrong?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is there something wrong?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Shivers: "Your vision blurs. You wipe your fa..."]
CheckItem("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckItem("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_navalcoat")
CheckItem("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckItem("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_navalcoat")

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckItem("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_navalcoat")

fields.Title: !(CheckItem("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckItem("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_navalcoat"))

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckItem("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckItem("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckItem("jacket_navalcoat")) == false

fields.Title: CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")
CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")

fields.Title: !(CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat"))

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_fritte_raincoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_nansencoat")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_navalcoat")) == false

fields.Title: You: "What's in the east?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's in the east?

fields.Title: Shivers: "La Drisienne, King Dris's Passenger..."
fields.Dialogue Text: La Drisienne, King Dris's Passenger Harbour. Cruise ships flanked by dock arms. Cranes watching over the mouth of the river distributary.

fields.Title: You: "What is across the distributary?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is across the distributary?

fields.Title: Shivers: "Your vision blurs. You wipe your fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your vision blurs. You wipe your face with your hand. The rain stings your eyes, making you look up and blink.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The spring thaw must be here. The s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The spring thaw must be here. The snow is melting...

fields.Title: You: "And beyond that?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And beyond that?

fields.Title: Shivers: "You -- on the Martinaise plaza. A s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You -- on the Martinaise plaza. A small dot looking up at the sky. Droplets form on your eyelashes.

fields.Title: You: "What is Jamrock?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is Jamrock?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It's home."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's home.

fields.Title: Shivers: "You realize you still have only one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You realize you still have only one shoe. Nearby, on the balcony of the Whirling-in-Rags hostel-cafeteria, a single crocodile-skin shoe now fills with rainwater.
